install.name: MiniFrontPage Module for J! 15
install.author: Reni Mustika, Erwin Ariza, Andy Sikumbang

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: sections
param.label: Section(s)
param.description: Section Ids (, separated)

param.name: categories
param.label: Category(s)
param.description: Category Ids (, separated)

param.name: order
param.label: Order by
param.description: Order content items / articles by most read or created date

param.name: period
param.label: Period of Novelty (Days)
param.description: Show popular items for the last period-of-novelty days

param.name: loadorder
param.label: Thumbnail Position
param.description: Thumbnail Position

param.name: cat_title
param.label: Show category title
param.description: Show/Hide Category Title

param.name: show_front
param.label: Frontpage Items
param.description: Show/Hide items designated for the Frontpage - only works when in Content Items only mode

param.name: show_title
param.label: Display Article title
param.description: whether to show article title or not

param.name: title_link
param.label: Title Link
param.description: Is title a link tag

param.name: show_author
param.label: Display author
param.description: whether to show author name or not

param.name: show_date
param.label: Display date articles created
param.description: whether to show date of articles created or not

param.name: limit
param.label: Limit intro text
param.description: Limit article intro text to specified number of characters, (default 0 means no limit, 1 means no intro text)

param.name: fulllink
param.label: Full story link text
param.description: if present a full story link will be added

param.name: columns
param.label: Number of columns
param.description: How many columns minifrontpage display articles introtext

param.name: count
param.label: Number of Articles to display
param.description: Choose how many articles to display

param.name: num_intro
param.label: Number of Introtext / Hide Introtext
param.description: Number of intro text to display if intro text will be showed up(default 1)- Fill with 0 to hide introtext

param.name: thumb_embed
param.label: Show thumbnails
param.description: Show / Hide thumbnail image in intro text - just like mosimage does

param.name: thumb_width
param.label: Thumbnail Image Width
param.description: thumb image width if embed thumbnail is selected

param.name: thumb_height
param.label: Thumbnail Image height
param.description: thumb image height if embed thumbnail is selected

param.name: aspect
param.label: Preserve Aspect
param.description: Preserve image aspect ratio, if yes the height param above doesn't matter

param.name: header_title_links
param.label: Header Title for another articles link
param.description: Show header title for another articles link if exist
